DataTypes_Undefined_key2: variable a is just declared and not assigned any value in it, whenever you will try to print before assigning a vlaue you will get undefined.
DataTypes_Undefined_key3: variable b is declared and assigned a value i.e., Hello World!
DataTypes_Undefined_key5: The undefined data type can only have one value-the special value undefined. If a variable has been declared, but has not been assigned a value, it has the value undefined.
